title: The Code
description: What is the price for freedom? Unfortunately, Fenesia Thornbark will find the answer the hard way.When the Kakus destroys Fenesia's home, then kills her parents, they have no idea that they have made her into a lethal weapon, and their worst enemy.The Kakus rule with impunity, but the people rise-up. And Fenesia becomes a warrior to be reckoned with.If you enjoyed "Hunger Games" and "Divergent," you will enjoy reading this book.
author: SD Logan
